quote: Among young people, often a key factor in them committing suicide is the trauma of transient relationships. They throw themselves into a friendship or network of friendships, then it collapses and they're desolate.
author: Vincent Nichols

quote: Suicide Note [10w] "Don't ask why I committed suicide.Question why everybody doesn’t.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: It is suicide to be abroad. But what it is to be at home, ... what it is to be at home? A lingering dissolution.
author: Samuel Beckett,  All That Fall and Other Plays for Radio and Screen. by Samuel Beckett

quote: For everyone now strives most of all to seperate his person, wishing to experience the fullness of life within himself, and yet what comes of all his efforts is not the fullness of life, but full suicide, for instead of the fullness of self-definition, they fall into complete isolation.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  The Brothers Karamazov

quote: Suicidal glory is the luxury of the irresponsible.
author: Lois McMaster Bujold,  Barrayar

quote: A book is a suicide postponed.
author: Emil Cioran

quote: When one realizes that his life is worthless he either commits suicide or travels.
author: Edward Dahlberg

quote: Anything that doesn't take years of your life and drive you to suicide hardly seems worth doing.
author: Cormac McCarthy

quote: Instead of committing suicide, people go to work.
author: Thomas Bernhard,  Correction

quote: There is but one true philosophical problem and that is suicide.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Having just enough life to enjoy being dead.
author: Jim Holt,  Why Does the World Exist?: An Existential Detective Story

quote: They tell us that Suicide is the greatest piece of Cowardice... That Suicide is wrong; when it is quite obvious that there is nothing in this world to which every man has a more unassailable title than to his own life and person.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: They tell us that suicide is the greatest piece of cowardice... that suicide is wrong; when it is quite obvious that there is nothing in the world to which every man has a more unassailable title than to his own life and person.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: I said to myself, 'I want to die decently'.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre,  The Wall

quote: A little part of me dies every time I try to commit suicide. If life is a buffet, I’m still in the mac and cheese phase. Maybe one day I’ll mature into more of a meatloaf kind of guy.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: Do what you love or die a slow death doing what you hate
author: Sonya Watson

quote: After a long, labored sigh, I said, “She was really happy when I got there. I’m pretty sure she was suicidal when I left.”“You do have that effect on people.
author: Darynda Jones,  Third Grave Dead Ahead

quote: When the suicide arrived at the sky, the people there asked him: "Why?"He replied: "Because no one admired me.
author: Stephen Crane,  Complete Poems of Stephen Crane

quote: I was so depressed I thought about committing TV. I mean suicide. In the end I decided to binge on @Netflix and it really made me feel better.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: A Suicide's Regret "I cut my vein in vain;blood slowly oozes out.I should've cut an arteryand watch it spurt and spout.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: To die, it's easy. But you have to struggle for life.
author: Art Spiegelman,  Maus I: A Survivor's Tale: My Father Bleeds History

quote: I'm the girl nobody knows until she commits suicide. Then suddenly everyone had a class with her.
author: Tom Leveen,  Party

quote: This is the secret of life: the self lives only by dying, finds its identity (and its happiness) only by self-forgetfulness, self-giving, self-sacrifice, and agape love.
author: Peter Kreeft,  Jesus-Shock

quote: Don't die without fulfilling your purpose.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  The Prince and the Pauper

quote: Well, darkness with humor... I'm not an extremely suicidal or sad person.
author: Peter Steele

quote: Suicide It's ironic that suicide, an act of cowardice,requires you overcome the all powerful instinct of self-preservation ~and thereby it's transformed into an act of bravery.On the other hand, the survivors would argue, an act of stupidity ~which many acts of bravery ultimately are.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: To be immortal and then die
author: Jean-Luc Godard,  Breathless

quote: I am constantly torn between killing myself and killing everyone around me.
author: David Levithan,  Will Grayson, Will Grayson

quote: What am I dying for?
author: Stephenie Meyer,  The Host

quote: Thinking of death--strange, beautiful, terrible and a long way off--made me feel happier than ever.
author: Dodie Smith,  I Capture the Castle

quote: Death, only, renders hope futile.
author: Edgar Rice Burroughs

quote: He was dead, all right. He had been shot, poisoned, stabbed, and strangled. Either somebody had really had it in for him or four people had killed him. Or else it was the cleverest suicide I'd ever heard of.
author: Richard S. Prather,  Take a Murder, Darling

quote: Merciful death. How you love your precious guilt
author: Anne Rice

quote: Dying is only one thing to be sad over. Living unhappily is something else.
author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie

quote: Suicide sometimes proceeds from cowardice, but not always; for cowardice sometimes prevents it; since as many live because they are afraid to die, as die because they are afraid to live
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Life is hard. After all, it kills you.
author: Katharine Hepburn,  Me: Stories of My Life

quote: Live life with a purpose and live it full out.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: There is but one truly serious philosophical problem and that is suicide. Judging whether life is or is not worth living amounts to answering the fundamental question of philosophy. All the rest — whether or not the world has three dimensions, whether the mind has nine or twelve categories — comes afterwards. These are games; one must first answer.
author: Albert Camus

quote: ...You find a way, somehow to get through the most horrible things, things you think would kill you. You find a way and you move through the days, one by one, in shock, in despair, but you move. The days pass, one after the other, and you go along with them - occasionally stunned, and not entirely relieved, to find that you are still alive.
author: Michelle Richmond,  The Year of Fog

quote: It kills me sometimes, how people die.
author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief

quote: Live like you were dying, Love because you are.
author: Mark Green

quote: If you are of the opinion that the contemplation of suicide is sufficient evidence of a poetic nature, do not forget that actions speak louder than words.
author: Fran Lebowitz,  Metropolitan Life/Social Studies

quote: Nothing else matters now that you love me.' - suicide note
author: Bauvard,  Some Inspiration for the Overenthusiastic

quote: Desire is half of life; indifference is half of death.
author: Kahlil Gibran,  Sand and Foam

quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King,  Different Seasons

quote: I was wasting my life, always thinking about myself.
author: Morrissey

quote: I feel like getting married, or committing suicide, or subscribing to L'Illustration. Something desperate, you know.
author: Albert Camus,  A Happy Death

quote: Death! Strange that there should be such a word, and such a thing, and we ever forget it; that one should be living, warm and beautiful, full of hopes, desires and wants, one day, and the next be gone, utterly gone, and forever!
author: Harriet Beecher Stowe,  Uncle Tom's Cabin

quote: Death is not the worst thing; rather, when one who craves death cannot attain even that wish.
author: Sophocles,  Electra

quote: To write poetry and to commit suicide, apparently so contradictory, had really been the same, attempts at escape.
author: John Fowles,  The Magus
